extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization using F5 BIG-IP versions 12.1.x or 11.6.x?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade F5 BIG-IP Software
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade F5 BIG-IP software to supported versions to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade F5 BIG-IP Software to Fixed Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade F5 BIG-IP software to fixed versions as recommended by CISA and MS-ISAC.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization unable to immediately patch?

extracted_playbook.title: Block iControl REST Access Through Self IP Address
extracted_playbook.description: Implement F5's temporary workaround to block iControl REST access through the self IP address.

extracted_playbook.title: Block iControl REST Access Through Management Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Implement F5's temporary workaround to block iControl REST access through the management interface.

extracted_playbook.title: Modify BIG-IP httpd Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: Modify the BIG-IP httpd configuration as per F5's temporary workaround guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain and Test Incident Response Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the organization has a maintained and tested incident response plan to reduce risk of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Vulnerability Program
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure the organization has a vulnerability program prioritizing patch management and vulnerability scanning.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure and Secure Internet-Facing Network Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Properly configure and secure internet-facing network devices to reduce risk of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Do Not Expose Management Interfaces to the Internet
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure management interfaces are not exposed to the internet to reduce risk of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Network Ports and Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused or unnecessary network ports and protocols to reduce risk of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unused Network Services and Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Disable or remove unused network services and devices to reduce risk of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Adopt Zero-Trust Principles and Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt zero-trust principles and architecture, including micro-segmenting networks and functions to limit or block lateral movements.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce MFA for all users and VPN connections to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Trusted Devices and Users
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict access to trusted devices and users on the networks to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Utilize CISA's Cyber Hygiene Services
extracted_playbook.description: Utilize CISAâ€™s Cyber Hygiene Services, which are free to all SLTT organizations and public and private sector critical infrastructure organizations.
